weekly_top_story.headline: Trump signs $1.2T spending package that funds HHS, enacts PBM reforms, telehealth and hospital-at-home measures
weekly_top_story.summary: President Trump signed a comprehensive $1.2 trillion spending package funding HHS while enacting key reforms on pharmacy benefit managers, telehealth expansions, and hospital-at-home programs, directly influencing healthcare funding, policy, and delivery models for professionals nationwide.

stories.headline: Kennedy, Rollins Unveil Historic Reset of U.S. Nutrition Policy, Put HHS released the Dietary Guidelines for Americans, 2025–2030
stories.summary: HHS unveiled the Dietary Guidelines for Americans 2025–2030, representing the most significant federal nutrition policy reset in decades, with implications for clinical nutrition practices, patient counseling, and public health initiatives.

stories.headline: Spectral AI to Participate in National Burn Awareness Week 2026 February 1–7, 2026
stories.summary: Spectral AI announced participation in National Burn Awareness Week with its AI-powered DeepView System for burn wound assessment, advancing predictive diagnostics that could enhance treatment decisions and reduce costs in burn care.
